title: Running Backs Preview Part Two: Thoughts on Every Relevant RB (08/11 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Bid on our Draft-A-Thon items right now to benefit St. Jude! http://cbssports.com/ebay
We'll give you some interesting trends at RB and your news and notes (4:00) before getting into ADP from Round 1 until the very end of your drafts! Let's start with the Round 1/2 turn (8:00) with Jonathan Taylor, Joe Mixon, Antonio Gibson, Najee Harris and Nick Chubb. We've got all the Mixon analysis you can handle! Plus our thoughts on CEH (22:40) before getting to the Round 3 RBs (28:33). How do we rank David Montgomery, J.K. Dobbins and D'Andre Swift? ... After that group it's a lot less exciting. Moving on to Round 4 (38:10), Chris Carson headlines the group but you could see Josh Jacobs, Myles Gaskin, Darrell Henderson and a few others come off the board here. How do we rank them? Jamey is a Gaskin believer! Is Kareem Hunt behind this tier? ... We look at Round 6 and beyond (54:30) from guys like Michael Carter and Damien Harris to Latavius Murray and A.J. Dillon and more! ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @ctowerscbs, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/fantasyfootballtoday
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/
Sign up for the FFT newsletter https://www.cbssports.com/newsletter
You can listen to Fantasy Football Today on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Fantasy Football Today podcast."
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
